basis: No actual eating action logged; the user only describes planned behavior for the next meal.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict; user acknowledges BED is tough but commits to gentleness and consistency.
negative_thought_patterns: Minimal; user avoids self-blame and emphasizes self-compassion and gradual progress.
emotional_triggers: Acknowledgement of BED difficulty and reliance on cravings context after meals; potential stress but framed as manageable.
coaching_notes: Maintain a compassionate, non-pressuring tone; reinforce small, observable actions (log, mood check, coping step); celebrate consistency over perfection and prepare for slips with reset strategies.
